name: OpsWorksVolumeConfigurationType
description: Describes the Amazon EBS volumes for the AWS::OpsWorks::Layer resource type.

properties.name: Iops
properties.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) to provision for the volume.

properties.name: MountPoint
properties.description: The volume mount point, such as /dev/sdh.

properties.name: NumberOfDisks
properties.description: The number of disks in the volume.

properties.name: VolumeType
properties.description: The type of volume, such as magnetic or SSD. For valid values, see VolumeConfiguration in the AWS OpsWorks API Reference.
